channel.title: Comments on: Blockchain in the Healthcare Industry

item.title: By: Akash Chaudhary
item.dc:creator: Akash Chaudhary
item.description: Use or blockchain technology increasing rapidly in every field. I hope there will be more better facilities in the future in medical field as well using blockchain technology.
item.content:encoded: Use or blockchain technology increasing rapidly in every field. I hope there will be more better facilities in the future in medical field as well using blockchain technology.

item.title: By: GodRACE
item.dc:creator: GodRACE
item.description: Blockchain will really help the health industry. This innovative solutions will last long
item.content:encoded:
Blockchain will really help the health industry.
This innovative solutions will last long

item.title: By: Anikys3reasure
item.dc:creator: Anikys3reasure
item.description:
Since I have joined the crypto space. I have learnt a lot about Blockchain and use cases on dacade.org and I understand that Blockchain is useful in every sector, health is not left out. Hope to see health sector of all country go fully into Blockchain soonest.
Nice reading this too.
item.content:encoded:
Since I have joined the crypto space. I have learnt a lot about Blockchain and use cases on dacade.org and I understand that Blockchain is useful in every sector, health is not left out. Hope to see health sector of all country go fully into Blockchain soonest.

Nice reading this too.

item.title: By: Quesi Job
item.dc:creator: Quesi Job
item.description: Blockchain has a whole of real life use cases and I'm glad I got to know more. I hope we all play a role to drive adoption.
item.content:encoded: Blockchain has a whole of real life use cases and I’m glad I got to know more. I hope we all play a role to drive adoption.

item.title: By: Jack Steeve
item.dc:creator: Jack Steeve
item.description: Hope this tech helps researchers in the treatment of viruses (including Covid-19) and unknown diseases.
item.content:encoded: Hope this tech helps researchers in the treatment of viruses (including Covid-19) and unknown diseases.
